text:
Office of the Attorney General | New York NYC Onsite | Data Scientist and Research Analyst

Join a growing and dynamic team taking on the challenging data driven research and investigation questions for the people's lawyer of New York.

Python, SQL, data skills.

Interview process - short phone interview, 1 hour in person with 2-3 folks, last step is half day onsite assignment and presentation.

jonathan dot werberg at ag dot ny dot gov
